pageContext.claim: “They have 25,000 soldiers right now protecting our border. And they've done a fantastic job. So we appreciate that very much. Mexico has never helped us on the border and they are now -- 25,000 soldiers. And you may want to talk about the numbers are down in half, I guess.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Customs and Border Patrol reports apprehensions have decreased by more than half since their peak in May 2019, but there are still thousand more than in September of 2018.
